entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
